    • Uses of ParsingExceptionCallback in org.jivesoftware.smack.parsing

      Subclasses of ParsingExceptionCallback in org.jivesoftware.smack.parsing 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ExceptionLoggingCallback
      Simple parsing exception callback that only logs the encountered parsing exception to java util logging.
      class  ExceptionThrowingCallback
      Parsing exception callback class that simply throws the encountered parsing exception.
